greeting: Hey there! Welcome to our awesome app!

Home.name: Hi, I'm {name}!
Home.description: I'm a software development whiz with experience building cool web and mobile apps. I've got skills in a bunch of programming languages and tech, including JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more! I'm always excited to learn and grow in this field.

job1.title: Backend Developer
job1.description: As a backend developer at TEFA STUDIO, I was in charge of developing and keeping the backend applications running smoothly using Node.js and Express. I also helped build APIs and connect them with the PostgreSQL database.

job2.title: FullStack Developer
job2.description: Being a fullstack developer at TEFA STUDIO, I got to build the website for SMKN 1 Bangsri. So cool!

Project.title: Projects
Project.subtitle: Check out some of the awesome projects I've worked on!

Article.title: Articles
Article.subtitle: Sometimes I love to write stuff down, and this is where I usually put it!
